title: How will we know it's us?
creator_credit: Lawrence Ravitz, Lawrence Ravitz Associates and National Trust for Historic Preservation
brief_description: Explores the importance of preserving and restoring historic buildings, explaining that continuity and change need not fight each other. We see projects in five communities throughout America in which preservation has been an essential element in urban renewal programs.
creator_credit_for_label: Lawrence Ravitz, Lawrence Ravitz Associates and National Trust for Historic Preservation
